name: Hasty Beetle
description:
I made this game as a school project with Pauline Barbet. As Game Design students at the ETPA school in Toulouse, France, it was very interesting to work on a project with only a theme as a guideline. We had to make a game around the theme "vehicles".  We wondered; "What if we could make speed limitations fun?". We challenged ourselves, and hope we did something good out of it!

Team : 

- Pauline Barbet (https://pauline-barbet.itch.io/)

- Leo Bergougnoux (https://sinhberg.itch.io/)
